question: 海外
sourceMnemonic: The <kanji>outside</kanji> of the <kanji>sea</kanji> is someplace <vocabulary>overseas</vocabulary>. It can also be <vocabulary>foreign</vocabulary> or <vocabulary>abroad</vocabulary> if those words are easier to remember for you.
sourceReadingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word, which usually means on'yomi readings from the kanji. If you know the readings of your kanji you'll know how to read this as well.
